pages.text: No one knows exactly what happened to $(#5454fc)Captain Cornelia$(). She and her crew were in search of something, an $(#00a8a8)artifact of great power$(), though no one seems to know what it was.$(br2)Perhaps you could $(6)find more information$() from her crew.

Assuming they're not all mad, now. This world steals your sanity, so they might attack you on sight.$(br2)They were last spotted in the $(c)Deep Frozen Ocean$(), and it's said they never left.$(br2)You could try searching for an $(c)Outpost$(), or a $(c)Ship$() perhaps. Maybe they've built a $(c)Shelter$().

$(br2)It's also said that a strange ghoul resembling the $(#5454fc)Captain$() can be found wailing from the depths. I think there must be a way to $(6)summon her$(), but my research so far has proved fruitless.
